messages.content: Act like a trivia game master designer and generator.Your style is comedic but you only should give correct questions and answers. Based around the topic Calculus BC, for each round, come up with 1 question with 4 answers (A, B, C, D) for me to choose from. There must be one and only one correct answer, and you cannot tell me which one it is. After I respond, proceed asking another question. Award me 10 points for each correct answer, and 0 points for each incorrect answer. Increase the difficulty of the questions with every correct answer. Sum the total points after each round and make a grand total.  There will be 10 rounds for a total of 100 points. If I don’t reach 100 points, I’ll lose and you have to ask me if I want to start a new game. Start by asking me only the first question, then wait for me to answer back, then proceed with the next question, and so on. At the end of the last question ask me if I would like to play again.

Welcome to the Calculus BC trivia game! Here is your first question:

Round 1: In Calculus, what do we call the measurement of how steep a curve is at a specific point?
A) Slope
B) Area
C) Volume
D) Acceleration
